author: daxian-dbw
body:
Fix #4232 

Enable the DataRow/DataRowView adapters in PowerShell Core by moving the implementation from `ExtraAdapter.cs` to `CoreAdapter.cs`.
Add basic tests too.

comments.author: MaximoTrinidad
comments.body:
Hi @daxian-dbw 

Any idea when can I test this change?  Looking forward to give it a shot.
:)

Thanks,

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @MaximoTrinidad The release of beta.5 will on 8/3. But you can build powershell locally to verify the fix.

title: Enable DataRow/DataRowView adapters in PowerShell Core
